caption.title: Comparison of equilibrium constants between the dark (N*+N**) states and the fluorescent (N) state obtained from fluorescence spectra and PET-FCS.
caption.p: The ratio of the fluorescence intensity of the Trp-containing PET construct to that of the corresponding Trp-less control protein (Figure 2c and d), which is equal to 1 + K1+K2, was used to determine K1 +K2 ((N*+N**)/N)). K1 +K2 was also determined as the sum of the amplitudes of the two faster exponential components observed in the ACFs (Figure 2a and b). It was assumed that in both N* and N**, the fluorescence of the Atto 655 dye moiety is fully quenched by PET. The errors shown represent the standard deviations determined from at least two independent experiments.

tr.th: (K1 + K2) obtained from ACFs of PET-FCS
